The rest of the transit degrees (989, 3276, 2318, and 33) are not relevant in determining the business relationships.

Overall, the inferred business relationships are:

* 1239-3356: p2c (provider-to-customer)
* 3356-9002: p2p (peer-to-peer)
* 3356-6846: p2c (provider-to-customer)
